title: Elorza Airport
text:
Elorza Airport is an airport serving the town of <a href="Elorza">Elorza</a> in the <a href="Apure">Apure</a> state of <a href="Venezuela">Venezuela</a>. The runway is in the middle of the town.
The Elorza <a href="non-directional%20beacon">non-directional beacon</a> (Ident: EZA) is located on the field.
